title: Dedicated Account Manager
job_overview:
PSend your CV here:Upgrade to see actual info


We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Dedicated Account Manager to serve as the main point of contact for an entire organization. This role requires exceptional communication, strategic thinking, and project coordination skills to ensure successful delivery of client initiatives and internal alignment.

Key Responsibilities:

Act as the primary liaison between internal teams and the client organization.

Oversee day-to-day account activities, ensuring timelines and expectations are met.

Coordinate cross-functional tasks including marketing, sales support, reporting, and customer success.

Track progress, prepare regular status updates, and manage action items.

Proactively identify opportunities for process improvements and upsell potential.

Facilitate meetings, follow up on key items, and ensure smooth execution of ongoing and upcoming campaigns.

Qualifications:

Proven experience as an Account Manager or Client Success Manager.

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Strong organizational and project management abilities.

Comfortable working with multiple stakeholders across departments.

Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.

Experience in high-paced environments or startup cultures is a plus.

2. Retail Data Entry Specialist (Temporary/Part-time)
Position Overview:
We are looking for a detail-oriented Retail Data Entry Specialist to support pricing updates and promotions across retail platforms. This role is ideal for someone organized, efficient, and comfortable handling repetitive tasks with accuracy.

Key Responsibilities:

Update product pricing and promotional details on e-commerce or retail platforms.

Ensure all data entries align with the campaign schedule and guidelines.

Coordinate with the team for changes or updates related to product listings.

Perform quality checks to avoid any discrepancies or errors.

Maintain and organize reports related to pricing history and promo schedules.

Schedule & Workload:

Initial workload: 2–4 weeks of full-time work (approx. 40 hours/week).

Followed by: 10 hours/week for the remainder of the quarter.

Qualifications:

Experience with data entry, e-commerce, or digital retail platforms.

High attention to detail and accuracy.

Ability to follow structured workflows and meet deadlines.

Strong communication and coordination skills.

Familiarity with retail product management or platforms like Weedmaps is a plus.
